fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Banking and financial services, Migration and asylum, Fraud prevention
head_office_address: Rue de la Science 14B c/o Afore Consulting
eu_initiatives: The EU-Asia Financial Services Roundtable follows all EU and Asian discussions impacting cross-border financial services regulation and policy between the two regions, including the extraterritorial application of rules, trade negotiations, as well as regulatory and supervisory cooperation at international level and between the two regions.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The EU-Asia Financial Services Roundtable promotes a shared understanding of the regulatory issues faced by financial markets participants in Europe and Asia, while also shaping the EU-Asian regulatory and policy discussions.
